template.name: gradleProperty
template.content:
aliyun_repo = http://maven.aliyun.com/nexus/content/groups/public
hotpotmaterial_common_version = 0.0.3
hotpotmaterial_jsonmeta_version = 0.0.3
spring_boot_version = 1.5.4.RELEASE
java_version = 1.8
group_name = org.hotpotmaterial
jar_name = ${projectName}
jar_version = 0.0.1-SNAPSHOT
druid_version = 1.1.0
usertype_version = 5.0.0.GA
lombok_version = 1.16.16
guava_version = 23.0
mybatis_spring_version = 1.2.0
hibernate_java8_version = 5.0.11.Final
mybatis_typehandlers_jsr310_version = 1.0.2
pagehelper_version = 5.1.0
pagehelper_spring_boot_starter_version = 1.1.0
gradle_version = 4.3.1
jackson_version = 2.8.8
swagger_version = 2.7.0
jwt_version = 0.7.0
<#if components?seq_contains("rescentersecurity")> rescenter_rest_version = 3.6.0-SNAPSHOT </#if>
<#if hasOracle == "1"> oracle_version = 12.1.0.1-atlassian-hosted </#if> <#if hasMysql == "1"> mysql_version = 5.1.43 </#if>
